house_listing.house_description: Custom built brick home. Open floor plan, upgraded appliances, extensive trim package with quality throughout. Oversized 3 garage with separate storage. Gas water and heat for added efficiency. High ceilings, circular driveway and more. Call for details.
house_listing.firm_name: The Prudential Decker Realty The Prudential Decker Realty
